News.headline: Daggers Player Live Commentary: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley FC
News.page_title: Daggers Player Live Commentary: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley FC
News.URL_keywords: Daggers Player Live Commentary: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley FC
News.short_description: If you are unable to make it to tonight's home fixture against Bromley FC, tune in to Daggers Player for live commentary and updates from the Chigwell Construction Stadium
News.description:
The Daggers will be facing local rivals Bromley FC looking to get back to winning ways after Saturday's 2-1 home defeat to Guiseley AFC.
 
John Still and his side welcome Bromley FC to the Chigwell Construction Stadium who they beat in the reverse fixture 3-1 back in September.
 
If you can’t make it to the game, James Glass will be on air from 7:25pm for tonight's game.

James Glass who will be joined by Mick Payne will bring you uninterrupted coverage of the game whilst keeping you up to date with all the goals around the country as they go in.

If you haven't already signed up to Daggers player click here.

Ticket information for the game can be found here.
